words_list.sentence: Could you tell me something about your last job?
Many reporters are keeping a watchful eye on the product launch.
You should know that evasion of taxation is against the law.
This corporate leader is going to employ a lawyer to defend his case.
He usually lays down on the sofa to read files.
The manager's mistaken judgment led to the failure of this negotiation.
The new employees are learning how to operate the systems.
These visitors are scheduled to leave tomorrow morning.
Yesterday afternoon, he lent his car to the manager.
This letter seems to be written by the sales manager.
He attended the training course in order to improve his management level.
The researcher tried to join the two lines together.
I can't link what you said with the manager.
I took it as a pleasure to work overtime those days.
What you should do is to stop polluting the air with black smoke.
Our products used to enjoy tremendous popularity all over the world.
Our factory possessed thousands of acres of land.
The building in the city center is in the possession of a merchant.
Is there any possibility that the boss will agree to the terms of the contract?
The meeting was postponed because of the bad weather.
I hope you can give me a precise date about the meeting.
The boss is precisely unwilling to do so.
It is hard for the businessman to predict what will happen in future.
The businessman invited his partners to watch the preview of a play.
The failure of the previous attempt nearly made the scientist lost hope.
I will stick to my opinion on matters of principle.
The boss insisted to give this matter priority.
I believe I can qualify myself for the job.
The quarterly meeting of the board will be held on Mar. 15th.
The two employees are reading carefully about each other's questionnaire.
I don't think it's the best price that he can quote us.
I feel confident since I am in readiness for the meeting.
The workers are practicing reassembling the car.
Oh, I forgot to ask for a receipt from the salesman.
Can you tell me the name of the receiver?
This is the twenty-first recommendation to the boss.
I think everyone is dissatisfied with the reduction in income.
I really don't know how to refine on our ways of producing.
It's said that the manager will make periodic visits to the department.
Everyone gets a trade periodical, don't they?
She showed great perseverance to overcome the strong temptation.
The artist is well-known for her perspective paintings.
It doesn't take much persuasion to get him to tell the truth.
They cannot show persuasive evidence to support their argument.
You'd better change your pessimistic view of life, hadn't you?
The newcomer is a doctor of pharmacy.
The phase-in of new policies caused some trouble.
The man seldom walks along the pier, does he?
The financial crisis plunged most people into despair.
The result of the poll will be declared in a week.
The man at the porch made no answer, did he?
There is a fishing port about twenty miles away.
We cannot find the portable test instrument.
The magnetic materials that he bought last month ran out.
She wonders if the signal will be automatically sent to the mainframe.
Entertainment seems to have become a main stream of expenditures.
Most consumers wish for the price maintenance of daily necessities.
They tried to reduce the debt to a manageable level.
He talked about the same managerial error that he made last month.
They had a mandate from the union to go on strike.
The secretary maneuvered the conversation round to bonus payments.
Young as he was, the reporter excelled at manipulating public opinion.
We are surprised at his manipulation of the stock market.
This is the largest automobile manufacturer in the area.
